A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worse Star Wars movie ever\, hell just a terrible movie take the Star Wars titles off and you have two hours of crap. The goal most have been to sell more stuffed toys and cute little critter items because the movie had no flow\, was in no way original and all around just losses me off. Luke’s character was destroyed \, went from one of my favorite to a self pity little birch. God this movie sucked. Star Wars has such a great premise it’s amazing how they keep screwing it up.
